project_plan.name: Python-based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design a Python-based quiz game that asks the user multiple-choice questions, tracks their score, and displays it at the end of the game. Questions and answers will be stored in variables within the code.

task.name: Implement the quiz question and answer structure
Create a function to ask questions and capture user input
Implement score tracking for correct answers
Display the user's score at the end of the game
Write tests for the game functionality
Execute tests on the game to ensure all parts function correctly
